languages.text: Астропаты пришли отомстить за уничтожение хора

traits.locale_text: Астропаты пришли отомстить за уничтожение хора

languages.text: "На нашу верность Вольный Торговец ответил{mf||а} предательством. Пусть варп поглотит нас, но мы заберем {mf|его|ее} с собой".

traits.locale_text: "На нашу верность Вольный Торговец ответил{rt_mf||а} предательством. Пусть варп поглотит нас, но мы заберем {rt_mf|его|ее} с собой".

languages.text: "The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {mf|him|her} along with us."
languages.original_text: "На нашу верность Вольный Торговец ответил{mf||а} предательством. Пусть варп поглотит нас, но мы заберем {mf|его|ее} с собой".

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {rt_mf|him|her} along."
"The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {rt_mf|him|her} along with us."
"The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {rt_mf|him|her} along with us."
"The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {mf|him|her} along with us."
"The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {mf|him|her} along with us."

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat unsere Loyalität mit Verrat vergolten." Der Warp mag uns verschlingen, aber er wird {mf|ihn|sie} mitnehmen."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {mf|him|her} along with us."

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat unsere Loyalität mit Verrat vergolten." Der Warp mag uns verschlingen, aber er wird {mf|ihn|sie} mitnehmen."

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} nous a remerciés de notre loyauté en nous trahissant. Même si le Warp nous dévore, il l'emportera {mf|lui|elle} aussi. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {mf|him|her} along with us."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} nous a remerciés de notre loyauté en nous trahissant. Même si le Warp nous dévore, il l'emportera {mf|lui|elle} aussi. »

languages.text: “行商浪人以背叛来回报我们的忠诚。或许亚空间会吞噬我们，但我们会带着{mf|他|她}一起上路。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {mf|him|her} along with us."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人以背叛来回报我们的忠诚。或许亚空间会吞噬我们，但我们会带着{mf|他|她}一起上路。”

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente paga nuestra lealtad con traición. Aunque la disformidad nos devore, nos {mf|lo|la} llevaremos con nosotros».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {mf|him|her} along with us."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente paga nuestra lealtad con traición. Aunque la disformidad nos devore, nos {mf|lo|la} llevaremos con nosotros».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーは、我々の忠誠に背いて報いた。〈歪み〉に飲み込まれようとも、奴も道連れにしてやる」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {mf|him|her} along with us."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーは、我々の忠誠に背いて報いた。〈歪み〉に飲み込まれようとも、奴も道連れにしてやる」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, sadakatimizin karşılığını ihanetle verdi. Öteboyut bizi yutabilir ama onu da yanımızda götüreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has repaid our loyalty with treachery. The warp may devour us, but we will take {mf|him|her} along with us."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir sadakatimizin karşılığını ihanetle verdi. Öteboyut bizi yutabilir ama o da bizimle gelecek."
